project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Implement a real-time text chat feature allowing users to send and receive messages instantly with support for text, emojis, and file attachments.
acceptance_criteria: Messages sent by one user appear on the recipient's chat window within 1 second under normal network conditions.
Chat history is preserved and can be retrieved upon reconnection after disconnection.
Supports sending text, emojis, and basic file attachments up to 25MB.
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Enable one-to-one and group video calls with real-time audio and video streaming, ensuring minimal latency and high quality.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate and receive video calls from their contact list.
Video and audio streams have less than 300ms latency under normal network conditions.
Supports at least 4 participants in a group call without quality degradation in video resolution or audio clarity.
non_functional: Audio clarity with jitter less than 30ms
Automatic bandwidth adaptation for varying network conditions

notes: Assumed maximum file attachment size of 25MB for messaging. Group call participant limit and performance thresholds are assumed due to lack of specifics. Added security and network condition clarifications.
